import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{handleExport}from"./utils/exportUtils";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EmployeeTable=()=>{const[employees,setEmployees]=useState([]);const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState("");const[selectedMonth,setSelectedMonth]=useState("October");const[selectedYear,setSelectedYear]=useState("2025");const[selectedBranch,setSelectedBranch]=useState("All");const[sortBy,setSortBy]=useState(null);const[sortOrder,setSortOrder]=useState("asc");useEffect(()=>{fetchEmployees();},[selectedMonth,selectedYear,selectedBranch]);const fetchEmployees=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/salaries/merged?month=".concat(selectedMonth,"&year=").concat(selectedYear,"&branch=").concat(selectedBranch==="All"?"":selectedBranch));console.log("Fetched employees:",response.data);const filtered=response.data.map(emp=>({employeeId:emp.employeeId,name:emp.name,// name: `${emp.firstName || ""} ${emp.lastName || ""}`.trim(),
base:Number(emp.baseSalary)||15000,hra:Number(emp.hra)||4000,conveyance:Number(emp.conveyance)||1000,attendanceDays:0,totalDays:30,branch:emp.branch||"Main Branch"}));setEmployees(filtered);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching employees:",error);}};const calculateDeductions=(base,totalEarning,preHra)=>{const employeePF=base*0.12;const totalEsiBase=base+preHra;const employeeESI=totalEsiBase*0.0075;const companyPF=base*0.0367;const companyESI=totalEsiBase*0.0325;const pension=base*0.0833;const companyPay=companyPF+companyESI;console.log("Deductions =>","Employee PF:",employeePF.toFixed(2),"| Employee ESI:",employeeESI.toFixed(2),"| Company PF:",companyPF.toFixed(2),"| Company ESI:",companyESI.toFixed(2),"| Pension:",pension.toFixed(2),"| Company calculateNetPayable=employee=>{const{base,hra,conveyance,attendanceDays,totalDays}=employee;const preBasic=base*attendanceDays/totalDays;const preHra=hra*attendanceDays/totalDays;const preConv=conveyance*attendanceDays/totalDays;const totalEarning=preBasic+preHra+preConv;const{employeePF,employeeESI}=calculateDeductions(preBasic,totalEarning,preHra);const netPayable=totalEarning-(employeePF+employeeESI);const ctc=netPayable+companyPay+(employeePF+employeeESI)+pension;return Math.round(ctc);};const updateEmployee=(index,field,value)=>{const
